node.html:
• Developed Unified Gen AI Platform using ReactJS & ExpressJS & collaborated with multiple teams to integrated their GenAI solutions
  • Built a Unified solution platform for patients using ReactJS & ExpressJS
  • Utilized GCP for cloud infrastructure
  • Implemented data interoperability, enabling seamless exchange & integration of information between the two systems
  • Utilized API integrations, to ensure secure & efficient transfer of data

• Designed & Implemented a server that creates Tekton Resources on Kubernetes Cluster using Tekton APIs
  • Wrote custom controller in Golang to automate creation of Tekton Resources
  • Built a CLI using Cobra to interact with server
  • Implemented Unit Tests for CLI commands & controller functions
  • Fixed bugs in KCP CLI

• Contributed to SBML4Humans that provides interactive web interface for SBML Models
  • Extended support for interactive annotations for SBML Models using VueJs & FastAPI

• Built a Full Stack AI Enabled B2B Cloud Application
  • Created minimalist UI using HTML, CSS, ReactJs
  • Wrote Java Backend Servlets and integrated with MySQL using JDBC
